definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: purpose, discretion, device (Je and WisdLt), [[מְזִמָּה]] Job 42:2 + 5 t.; [[הַמְּזִמָּ֫תָה]] Je 11:15 (but rd. for [[רַבִּים]] ´[[המ]] with LXX [[הַמְּזִמּׂת]] [[הַֽנְדָרִים]]); [[מְזִמָּתוֹ]] Je 51:11; pl. abs. [[מְזִמּוֹת]] Ps 37:7 + 7 t.; cstr. id. Je 23:20, Je 30:24; sf. [[מְזִמּוֹתָיו]] Ps 10:4; —
of ´[[י]]'s purposes Job 42:2; chiefly in punishment (cf. [[זׇמַם]], [[זִמָּה]]) Je 23:20, Je 30:24, Je 51:11(‖[[זמם]] v:Je 51:12).

definitions.title: 3. a.
definitions.body: evil thoughts of men Ps 10:4, evil devices of men Job 21:27 (‖[[מחשׁבות]]), Ps 10:2, Ps 21:12 (both c. [[חָשַׁב]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: wickedness in act Je 11:15, Ps 37:7 (both c. [[עָשָׂה]]), Ps 139:20 [[לִמְזִמָּה]] = wickedly;—note phrases: [[מְזִמּוֹת אישׁ]] a man of (evil) devices (or practices) Pr 12:2 (opp. [[טוֹכ]]) Pr 14:17; [[בַּעַל־מְזִמּוֹת]] Pr 24:8 (‖[[מְחַשֵּׁב]] [[לְהָרֵעַ]]; v. [[בַּעַל]]).
